GSD.product_version: versions from v3.7 to before v5.4.220
GSD.description:
memory: of: Fix refcount leak bug in of_get_ddr_timings()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 85a40bfb8e7a170abcf9dae2c0898a1983e48daa, it was introduced in version v3.7 by commit e6b42eb6a66c188642aeb447312938c6f6ebee86. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: memory: of: Fix refcount leak bug in of_get_ddr_timings()
